comments: K. Williams (OKC) establishes himself in Thompson's (HOU) path and does not deliver illegal contact when setting the pick.
K. Williams (OKC) slides his hand off VanVleet's (HOU) body, and the contact during the drive is marginal.
J. Williams (OKC) and Thompson (HOU) come together at the same spot on the floor while the shot travels through the air, and the contact during the rebounding opportunity is marginal.
Smith Jr. (HOU) steps towards J. Williams (OKC) and turns his body into the oncoming defender, delivering contact that displaces J. Williams during the pick.
Brooks (HOU) rests and promptly removes his hand from J. Williams' (OKC) left shoulder, and the contact during the inbound is marginal.
Dort (OKC) firms up in Thompson's (HOU) path and does not deliver any illegal contact when setting the pick.
Brooks (HOU) brings his right arm out towards the ball when he grazes J. Williams' (OKC) arm as he releases his pass.
Brooks (HOU) maintains position in the court of play and avoids stepping out of bounds while in contact with the ball.
Giddey (OKC) jumps into the air and does not maintain a legal vertical position as he turns into Brooks (HOU) and body contact occurs, which alters Brooks' driving shot attempt.
Giddey (OKC) establishes himself in Brooks' (HOU) path and does not deliver any illegal contact when setting the pick.
J. Williams (OKC) crosses halfcourt and establishes himself in the frontcourt in under eight seconds.

Brooks (HOU) goes into the air as he brings his arm toward the ball and makes contact with the ball and incidental hand-on-ball contact with J. Williams (OKC), which legally dislodges the ball during the driving shot attempt in the lane. The arm contact after the dislodge is considered incidental.

Green (HOU) moves alongside J. Williams' (OKC) path and absorbs the body contact during the drive. After J. Williams' gather, Green brings his hand towards the ball and marginal brush contact occurs during the driving shot attempt.
The ball comes into contact with Green (HOU) while he is standing out of bounds and possession is properly awarded to Oklahoma City.
Smith Jr. (HOU) legally contests K. Williams' (OKC) jump shot attempt.
Dort (OKC) and Thompson (HOU) come together during the pick and marginal contact occurs as they disengage.
Brooks (HOU) reaches in for the ball and makes contact with J. Williams' (OKC) left arm after his gather, which impacts his driving shot attempt.
Williams (OKC) commits a take foul on Thompson (HOU). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
Thompson (HOU) commits a take foul on J. Williams (OKC). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
Jay. Williams (OKC) firms up in Thompson's (HOU) path and marginal contact occurs as the two players come together during the screen.
Thompson (HOU) legally contests J. Williams' (OKC) jump shot attempt.
J. Williams (OKC) rests and promptly slides his hand off of Green's (HOU) side and the contact during the drive is marginal.
Green (HOU) brings his off-arm back as he angles his drive and marginal contact occurs with J. Williams' (OKC) resting arm.

K. Williams (OKC) is the secondary defender on a drive into the lower defensive box and his right heel is positioned inside the Restricted Area when illegal body contact occurs with Green (HOU), which affects his driving shot attempt.
VanVleet (HOU) reaches for the ball when marginal contact occurs with J. Williams (OKC) before he retracts his arm during the contest of the shot attempt.
Giddey (OKC) touches the ball while it is still on the rim with a chance to score.
Green's (HOU) off-arm comes out slightly as he stops his forward momentum and marginal contact occurs with Dort's (OKC) side at the end of the drive.
Dort (OKC) closes out into Green's (HOU) space and body contact occurs after the release, which impacts Green's ability to return to the floor normally.
Brooks (HOU) legally contests Joe's (OKC) jump shot, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released.
Brooks (HOU) establishes himself in Dort's (OKC) path and absorbs the marginal contact as the two players come together during the pick.
J. Williams (OKC) jumps to Green's (HOU) side when their bodies graze and marginal contact occurs during Green's driving shot attempt.
Green (HOU) steps into Giddey's (OKC) path and is not in a legal defensive position when body contact occurs, which affects Giddey's SQBR after he gathers.
Wiggins (OKC) reaches for the ball when marginal contact occurs with Thompson (HOU) before he passes in the backcourt.
Joe (OKC) commits a take foul on VanVleet (HOU). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
J. Williams (OKC) brings his arm toward the ball and marginal brush contact occurs with Thompson (HOU) during his dunk attempt at the basket.
Smith Jr. (HOU) rests his hand on Wiggins' (OKC) side and the contact during the driving shot attempt is marginal.
Joe (OKC) brings his right arm toward the ball and marginal brush contact occurs with VanVleet (HOU) during the drive into the frontcourt.
Joe (OKC) reaches for the ball when he slides his hand off VanVleet's (HOU) side during his drive.
Replay review of the foul called on Dort (OKC) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful. Dort commits illegal contact to VanVleet (HOU) prior to bringing his left hand to the ball.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: The ball goes out of bounds after being last touched by J. Williams (OKC). Possession is properly awarded to Houston.
